name: ElementalRL
description:
A roguelike created for 7DRL 2020. Follow the Guardian on their quest to absorb elementals from the kingdom of Empyria.

Tiles and cover art by FE_Littlepip.

Controls:

Numpad for movement.
g to pick up items
i to open inventory
main enter (not numpad) to go down stairs
letter corresponding to item in inventory to use/equip
d to drop items
c to open character menu
escape to exit menu and game

New Guardians:

Along the way, you will fight several types of elementals. Each of these elementals is strong vs one type and weak vs another type. The chart below shows these strengths and weaknesses (think Pokemon).
